text: Babwire bamwe basigara inyuma muri babantu bo mubugararwa yuko ubu vuba muzo hamagarwa kugenda mungwano n’abantu bafise ubumenyi bukaze bw’ingwano, kuko muzo rwana nabo canke bazoneshwa, rero nimwa gamburukira Imana izobaha impembo yanyu nziza, rero nimwa hindukira nkuko mwahindukiye aho hambere Imana izoba hana ibihano bibabaza cane
